title: Yugoslavia: the land and the people
brief_description: In Yugoslavia a mixture of many types of people live in a land that is also varied. Separated by mountains, they have developed differences in their ways of life, their language and their names. Today, under a Communist government, the people are trying to unite into one nation.

Separated by mountains, they have developed differences in their ways of life, their language and their names. Today, under a Communist government, the people are trying to unite into one nation.
